text: Anthony Christopher Hicks (born 16 December 1945) is an English guitarist and singer. He was a member of the British pop group The Hollies since 1963. He was added into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2010.Band Profile – Current Members – Tony Hicks . Hollies.co.uk (16 December 1945). Retrieved on 5 August 2011. Dead link on 12/15/2015 He was born in Nelson, Lancashire. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:English rock singers Category:English rock guitarists Category:Singers from Lancashire Category:Musicians from Lancashire
